mapper.sql: ID, OMS_ID, NAME, SEX, CSRQ, B0100, WORK_UNIT, INCUMBENCY_STATUS, POST, ZJLX, ZJHM, YXQZ, CARD_STATUS, SAVE_STATUS, QFJG, QFRQ, CSDD, ZHZXZT, ZXFS, ZXYY, ZXSM, APPEND_PLACE, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER, APPLY_QUERY_START_TIME, APPLY_QUERY_END_TIME,LSZJHM,CLDYJ, BLDYJ, CLDYJLY, BLDYJLY, GATSHYJ, GATYJLY
mapper.update:
update oms_cer_cancellate_license set
CLDYJ=#{cldyj} , CLDYJLY=#{cldyjly} , ZHZXZT=#{zhzxzt} , MODIFY_USER=#{modifyUser} , MODUFY_TIME=#{modifyTime} ,
id in
#{item}
mapper.select:
select cc.ID as id, cc.OMS_ID as omsId, cc.NAME as name, cc.SEX as sex, cc.CSRQ as csrq, #出生日期 orp.WORK_UNIT as workUnit, orp.INCUMBENCY_STATUS as incumbencyStatus, #在职状态 orp.POST as post, #职务 cc.ZJLX as zjlx, #证件类型 cc.ZJHM as zjhm, #证件号码 cc.YXQZ as yxqz, #有效期至 cc.CARD_STATUS as cardStatus, #证照状态 cc.SAVE_STATUS as saveStatus, #保管状态 cc.SURELY_WAY as surelyWay, #保管方式 cc.CABINET_NUM as cabinetNum, #机柜编号 cc.PLACE as place, #机柜位置 cc.COUNTER_NUM as counterNum #柜台编号 cc.QFJG as qfjg, #签发机关 cc.QFRQ as qfrq, #签发日期 cc.CSDD as csdd, #出生地 occl.ZHZXZT as zhzxzt, #证照申请注销状态 occl.B0100 as b0100, #单位主键 occl.ZXFS as zxfs, #注销方式 occl.ZXYY as zxyy, #注销原因 occl.ZXSM as zxsm, #注销说明 occl.LSZJHM as lszjhm, #临时证件号码 occl.APPEND_PLACE as appendPlace, #发生地 occl.CLDYJ as cldyj, #处领导意见 occl.BLDYJ as bldyj, #部领导意见 occl.CLDYJLY as cldyjly, #处领导意见理由 occl.BLDYJLY as bldyjly, #部领导意见理由 occl.CREATE_USER as createUser #创建人 from cf_certificate cc join oms_reg_procpersoninfo orp on cc.OMS_ID = orp.ID join oms_cer_cancellate_license occl on occl.A0100 = cc.A0100
occl.B0100 in
#{item}
and
cc.zjlx=#{zjlx} and occl.zhzxzt=#{zhzxzt} and
occl.CREATE_TIME between #{applyQueryStartTime} and #{applyQueryEndTime} and
cc.zjhm like concat('%',#{zjhm},'%') and cc.name like concat('%',#{name},'%') and
order by occl.CREATE_TIME desc
